snippet: Now that Xstrata's board has backed Glencore International's bid, it's up to shareholders to decide. | Barron's makes a bullish case for Goldman Sachs. | Leon Cooperman takes aim at President Obama's rhetoric in a widely circulated letter. | David...
abstract: Now that Xstrata's board has backed Glencore International's bid, it's up to shareholders to decide. | Barron's makes a bullish case for Goldman Sachs. | Leon Cooperman takes aim at President Obama's rhetoric in a widely circulated letter. | David Rubenstein at Duke University, his alma mater.

headline.main: Glencore-Xstrata, Not Quite a Done Deal
